#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int T,num,i,ans;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&num);
        i=num,ans=0;
        while(i>1)  ans+=i/=2;
        printf("%d\n",ans);
        
        i=num,ans=0;
        while(i>1)  ans+=i/=3;
        printf("%d\n",ans);
        
        i=num,ans=0;
        while(i>1)  ans+=i/=5;
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
